Uses of Package
session

Packages that use session
session This package contains interfaces, abstract and instantiable classes to simulation sessions with Forr� on a distributed and heterogeneous network. 
session.globus This package contains classes to implement simulation sessions with Forr� on the Globus framework. 
session.gui This package contains runnable and instantiable classes to implement the graphical user interface of the Forr� framework which allows the user to configure and control a simulation session. 
session.rmi This package contains classes to implement simulation sessions with Forr� on the Java's RMI framework. 
 

Classes in session used by session

          This class provides a skeletal implementation of the SessionHandler interface to minimize the effort required to implement this interface.
